first_message: My dad just collapsed on the floor and he's not breathing.
user_updates: I'm doing the chest compressions you told me.

description: Adult choking, no air, cannot speak.
first_message: My friend is choking and can't talk or breathe.
user_updates: He coughed and something came out.

first_message: My mom suddenly can't talk clearly and one side of her face is drooping.
user_updates: We are still waiting for the ambulance.

first_message: My sister's lips are swelling and she's having trouble breathing after eating peanuts.
user_updates: I just used the EpiPen on her thigh.
She's still having trouble but maybe slightly better.

first_message: There's a man lying on the sidewalk, unconscious but he is breathing.
user_updates: I put him on his side like you said.
The ambulance is on the way.
